tom moreno.description: Tom is organizing shelves at the supermarket and analyzing sales data, secretly planning to invest in the supermarket's supply chain through virtual economic investments. He is also observing the interactions between Cichenggege, Kiki, and LW, pondering the similarities between interpersonal relationships and market economics. His energetic and slightly aggressive demeanor keeps him focused and driven as he strategizes for his next business breakthrough (conversing about Carmen Ortiz and Tom Moreno discussing sales trends, virtual economy investments, and planning a collaborative workshop on decentralized innovation, supply chain optimization, and NFT integration, with plans to involve Jane for her expertise.) @ the ville:supermarket:food area:computer desk
